item.title: Is Your Home Part of a Cyber Army?
item.description: Introduction As a requirement for completing the Applied Cybersecurity Bachelors program, I attended an internship program with the Internet Storm Center. I was tasked to create a Honeypot on a Pi and report six different attack observations. This post is going to explore one of those attack observations Summary As a quick summary, I dive into uncovering a malicious file. From that file, I was able to uncover more malicious files by actively connecting to an attackerâ€™s FTP server.
